pr_title: [CDAP-16959] Avoiding creation of uuid if already present for macros

timeline.bodyText: Can't we combine this and const macros =  statement into one? Do we have to reset currentRuntimeArgs.pairs 3 times?
timeline.author: ajainarayanan

replies.bodyText: Simplified the implementation here. Did not change the implementation in hydrator-service as that needs more work and reusing this implementation won't work there.
replies.author: itsanudeep

timeline.message: simplify getRuntimeArgsForDisplay implementation in pipelineconfiguration store
